title: Is every cell phone manufactured today a smartphone? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, not by any means is every phone out there a smartphone. DORO, Nokia, CAT, and Swisstone just to name a few locally all have candy bar and flip phone style feature phones. I couldn't name the ones in other markets but yes, these phone are around. Not everyone wants a smartphone and these sell very well.
No, the so called “Dumb” phones are still being made, also phones for the elderly and emergency phones. If you look online you can still find plenty of them even in 2019
